segments.text: Did you work in a charity organization ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I had been in the charity organization for 2 months and I learned a lot from that experience , including love , sympathy , equality , and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In what way did those social activities have impact on your mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it had direct impact on my way of thinking . I learned to look at people and things from an overall perspective . In that case , I am not easy to be edgy .
segments.speaker: S2
